title: PS5 Fixes Incoming! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.13.21
description:
Greg and Gary Whitta talk about the first #PS5 System Update, CD Projekt not giving up on #Cyberpunk, and Janina Gavankar joining the #Borderlands movie!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:30 - Housekeeping

PSILY is live! TLOU Remake! No Days Gone 2!

Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Tom Bock, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie

The Roper Report -
00:05:25 - PS5 System Update Incoming
00:23:25 - CD Projekt Isn’t Giving Up on Cyberpunk, Reuters
00:35:50 - Janina’s in the Borderlands Movie
00:39:00 - Alloy’s in Fortnite
00:41:50 - Ubi Shutting Down some Servers, Darryn Bonthuys @ GameSpot
00:53:50 - Nintendo Indie World announced
00:58:30 - BREAKING: SDCC 2021 cancelled & Warzone news!
01:00:35 - Out today
01:03:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Andy
